attributes.action: Stop the proposed closure of Danesmore Park  primary school situated on ashmore park estate wednesfield wolverhampton
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Danesmore park is one of four primary schools on ashmore park. As we are the only one of the four schools which as a resources base for S.E.N pupils and we have our own swimming pool we think that the proposal is wrong. Please help us by signing this petition. Thankyou
